descriptionHtml:
[img]http://shrani.si/f/2j/11g/4fPOB5qr/description.png[/img]

Aurora Blade by Gizmodian ported to skyrim.

Original file: [url=http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=24118]Aurora Blade[/url]

[img]http://shrani.si/f/2M/Cm/4S4UjNcX/additional-info.png[/img]

Stand-alone? Yes.
Craftable? Yes.
Upgradeable? Yes.
Where to get it? You can craft it at forge under Daedric category or Buy it at locations writen below.

=================================
Can be purchased in:

Whiterun - Eorlund (Skyforge Blacksmith)
Riverwood - Alvor (Blacksmith)

Scabbard is from vanilla sword as this sword didnt have original scabbard.

[img]http://shrani.si/f/N/vw/32QOhOln/installation.png[/img]

Manual: Extract RAR file & put textures, meshes folders & .esp file inside your Skyrim/Data folder & activate ESP file.
Downloading via NMM: First i suggest to delete any previous manual installation\'s then just install with NMM and activate ESP file.

[img]http://shrani.si/f/16/qb/2qzSueGD/uninstalling.png[/img]

Manual: Delete files.
NMM: Go to \"Mods\" select the mod and click icon(blue folder with red arrow) on the left, that will deactivate and delete installed files.

[img]http://shrani.si/f/1z/UD/4MycJeJH/update-log.png[/img]

v1.1 - 2H Version added + Scabbard added on 1H.

[img]http://shrani.si/f/2s/mz/1v3GZxUG/credits.png[/img]

[url=http://www.tesnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=341209]Gizmodian[/url] - Author of the sword
author: Snezko
